verses.roman:
pūrve śrī-mādhava-purī āilā vṛndāvana
bhramite, bhramite gelā giri govardhana

synonyms: pūrve—formerly; śrī-mādhava-purī—Śrīla Mādhavendra Purī; āilā—came; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana; bhramite bhramite—while traveling; gelā—went; giri govardhana—to the hill known as Govardhana.
translation: Once, Śrī Mādhavendra Purī traveled to Vṛndāvana, where he came upon the hill known as Govardhana.
